feed.title: NewsTracker: sxsw
feed.subtitle: This is a news tracking demo

entry.title: Course correction at this year's SXSW, but hard to make music stick
entry.summary:
Having spent the better part of a week trudging around downtown Austin - from concerts to parties to panel discussions - I agree that SXSW has changed.

Bentley meant that, minus the distractions of a Kanye West or a Kendrick Lamar (both of whom were rumored to appear but didn't), attendees could more easily focus on what SXSW was founded to do.

entry.title: Snoop Dogg says he's developing HBO series
entry.summary: Snoop Dogg takes part in the "Keynote Conversation with Snoop Dogg" during the SXSW Music Festival on Friday, March 20, 2015 in Austin, Texas.

entry.title: R&B singer The Weeknd, in sultry mood, performs during SXSW
entry.summary: "Can I ask you something, Austin, Texas? I want to ask you a question, SXSW. Can I get sexy for you, SXSW?" he asked the feverish crowd of a few hundred.

entry.title: R&B singer The Weeknd, in sultry mood, performs during SXSW
entry.summary: The R&B singer performed Thursday on the second night of the "YouTube at SXSW" event at the Coppertank Events Center.

entry.title: Miley Cyrus surprises crowd at SXSW event starring rappers
entry.summary: Miley Cyrus appears onstage for a Mike Will Made It performance at the Fader Fort Presented by Converse during the SXSW Music Festival on Thursday, March 19, 2015 in Austin, Texas.

entry.title: Miley Cyrus surprises crowd at SXSW event starring rappers
At SXSW, folk-roots mother-son duo build buzz
entry.summary: Madisen Ward and the Mama Bear, a mother and son duo consisting of Madisen Ward, left, and Ruth Ward, pose for a photograph during the SXSW Music Festival on Wednesday, March 18, 2015 in Austin, Texas.

entry.title: Mary J. Blige shines at unofficial SXSW show
Documentary about Tower Records debuts at SXSW festival
entry.summary: The music portion of SXSW kicked off Tuesday until Sunday.

entry.title: Documentary about Tower Records debuts at SXSW festival
SXSW: Will Ferrell-Kevin Hart comedy 'Get Hard' divides fest audience
entry.summary: Before the Will Ferrell-Kevin Hart comedy "Get Hard" was unveiled at SXSW Monday night, the crowd inside the Paramount Theater was in good spirits.

entry.title: Best Coast, Snoop Dogg and Kanye West are among the acts descending upon SXSW
entry.summary: What exactly are these artists seeking at SXSW, which began in 1987 as a kind of low-key regional expo?

entry.title: Molly Ringwald joins Ally Sheedy to celebrate The Breakfast Club's 30th anniversary?at SXSW festival
Trending at SXSW: Mind cloning, off-the-grid messaging
entry.summary: Festival goers needing a break from the hubbub of SXSW can take a trip back in time with an immersive audio tour from startup Detour that lets listeners discover Austin in 1885, "the year that broke Austin."

entry.title: ?Live-streaming apps dominate buzz at SXSW
entry.summary:
Meanwhile, rival live-streaming app Stre.am is a finalist for SXSW's innovation awards.

Gore called upon SXSW attendees to get involved in supporting climate change legislation ahead of environmental talks in Paris in December.

entry.title: 'Furious 7' to debut at SXSW in surprise screening
entry.summary:
LOS ANGELES - The seventh installment of the "Fast & Furious" franchise, "Furious 7," will get a surprise screening Sunday night at the SXSW Film Festival, sources confirm.

Just added for all #SXSW badges: surprise screening of a huge film, 7 mins after midnight tonight @ Paramount.
